# Diabolic (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* | Asmodeus, Baalzebul, Mammon, Mephistopheles |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** Once per day, character can add her class level as a bonus on a [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]], [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]], [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]], or [[Sense Motive (Skill)|Sense Motive]] check.

**Diabolic Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Devil's Tail (Spell)|Devil’s Tail]]****:** Caster gains a spiked tail that deals 1d4 damage.

   **[[Protection From Good (Spell)|Protection from Good]]****:** +2 to AC and saves, counter mind control, hedge out good elementals and outsiders.

**2** **[[Devil's Eye (Spell)|Devil’s Eye]]****:** Caster can see in even magical darkness, up to 30 ft.

**3** **[[Devil's Ego (Spell)|Devil’s Ego]]****:** Caster gains 1d4+1 Cha and become an outsider.

**4** **[[Hellfire (Spell)|Hellfire]]****:** Explosion of brimstone deals 3d6 damage in 5-ft. radius.

**5** **[[Planar Binding, Lesser (Spell)|Lesser Planar Binding]]****:** Traps outsider until it performs a task.

**6** **[[Planar Binding (Spell)|Planar Binding]]****:** As *[[Planar Binding, Lesser (Spell)|lesser planar binding]]*, but up to 16 HD.

**7** **[[Hellfire Storm (Spell)|Hellfire Storm]]****:** Explosion of brimstone deals 5d6 damage in 20-ft. radius.

**8** **[[Demand (Spell)|Demand]]****:** As *[[Sending (Spell)|sending]]*, plus caster can send *[[Suggestion (Spell)|suggestion]]*.

**9** **[[Gate (Spell)|Gate]]****:** Connects two planes for travel or summoning.

   **[[Investiture of the Pit Fiend (Spell)|Investiture of the Pit Fiend]]****:** Target gains powerful claw attacks, ability to inflict disease, or ability to inflict terror.


| **Source:** | Book of Vile Darkness (WotC), pg. 81 |
